title: Very slow synchronisation, most blocks ignored?
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.4.7-stable`
OS & Version: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

**Geth version**
Geth
Version: 1.4.7-stable
Protocol Versions: [63 62 61]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.6.1
OS: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=/usr/lib/go-1.6

On my laptop, the synchronisation, will probably finish in a couple of days. But on google compute engine, it is quite slow.

The geth process was started with following parameter

```
geth --fast --datadir="/ether_data" --unlock=0 --cache "512" --password "/etc/ethereum_passwd" --rpc --rpcaddr "10.140.0.9"
```
#### Backtrace

```
I0628 01:43:07.012889 eth/downloader/downloader.go:320] Block synchronisation started
I0628 01:44:19.267806 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2 ignored) including 0 txs in 1.993154055s. #2 [88e96d45 / b495a1d7]
I0628 01:44:20.416376 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 4 ignored) including 0 txs in 186.189251ms. #6 [3d612266 / 1f1aed8e]
I0628 01:44:38.884680 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 30 ignored) including 0 txs in 1.728414264s. #36 [e0c7c0b4 / 5f81bfa6]
I0628 01:44:55.129918 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 19 ignored) including 0 txs in 760.421375ms. #55 [0ee49bf8 / eb5889a2]
I0628 01:44:57.334845 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 10 ignored) including 0 txs in 400.413171ms. #65 [60b81393 / 35209c6c]
I0628 01:46:25.384561 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2048 ignored) including 0 txs in 1m13.626292271s. #2113 [5fa77eb9 / 7b211262]
I0628 01:47:25.780926 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2048 ignored) including 0 txs in 1m0.390229647s. #4161 [68fd435b / 9152e0d6]
I0628 01:47:34.264227 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 323 ignored) including 0 txs in 8.482023799s. #4484 [c158f052 / 6c8a6721]
I0628 01:48:31.864040 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2048 ignored) including 0 txs in 57.536884699s. #6532 [28108983 / e9ff6cb7]
I0628 01:49:22.515982 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2048 ignored) including 0 txs in 50.645476587s. #8580 [6b74b8d8 / 6cfb6af7]
I0628 01:50:13.003345 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2048 ignored) including 0 txs in 50.48049627s. #10628 [4d2f35f9 / 392497c4]
I0628 01:51:01.587176 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2048 ignored) including 0 txs in 48.577451942s. #12676 [1071b038 / 84cb1763]
I0628 01:51:56.606121 core/blockchain.go:964] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2048 ignored) including 0 txs in 54.960267293s. #14724 [a550e855 / ef020ef7]
```

Syncing on a SSD works well, however syncing on a USB mechanical HDD is VERY slow. Geth 1.4.7 was taking a long time, so I switched to Parity and it sync'd in a few hours without the severe disk thrashing witnessed in Geth.
